alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 1:36PM CST until January 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations generally 1 to 4 inches. Winds will be light, averaging less than 10 MPH out of the north. * WHERE...Phillips, Smith and Jewell Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Although parts of the Advisory area could see snow start a bit earlier than 6 AM and last a bit later than 6 PM, the vast majority of accumulation should occur between 6 AM and 6 PM.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
